thread.title: SpiceJet launches ‘Red Hot Fares’ Sale - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: SpiceJet launches ‘Red Hot Fares’ Sale - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
SpiceJet launches ‘Red Hot Fares’ Sale Published on : Monday, July 6, 2015
SpiceJet, the country’s #2 and most innovative low fare airline, today announced the launch of a ‘Red Hot Fares’ sale focused exclusively on its western and southern domestic network.
Fares start from Rs. 1,899/- all-in for routes such as Mumbai-Goa, Ahmedabad-Mumbai, Bangalore-Hyderabad, Chennai-Bangalore, Pune-Bangalore, and many more.
The three day sale is currently live, and remains open till midnight, July 08, 2015. The travel period covered in this sale is 15th July 2015 to 30th September 2015 and is valid for direct, via and connecting flights on the selected routes.`
Tickets for this sale can be booked on www.spicejet.com, on online travel portals, and through travel agents. The sale is not available at SpiceJet’s call centre or Airport Ticket Offices. Tickets under this offer are non-refundable (taxes and fees are refundable) though changeable with a change fee and fare difference. There is limited inventory under the offer, and seats will be available on First-Come-First-Served basis. Sales fares are not applicable on group bookings. Fares vary from sector to sector depending on the travel distance and flight schedules and timings are subject to regulatory approvals and change(s).
